Detailed Description

Structure representing a node of a generic graph.

Member Data Documentation

◆ adjList

int* gft::Graph::sGraphNode::adjList

Adjacency list (list of nodes that are adjacent to the given node) implemented as a dynamically allocated array with current length in use given by outdegree.

◆ arraysize

int gft::Graph::sGraphNode::arraysize

The actual total allocated length of the array used to store the adjacency list.

◆ id

int gft::Graph::sGraphNode::id

◆ outdegree

int gft::Graph::sGraphNode::outdegree

The current number of adjacent nodes for the given node.

◆ Warcs

int* gft::Graph::sGraphNode::Warcs

The corresponding arc weights for the adjacency list.
